DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Asia . The aim trial investigate pharmacokinetics ( exposure trial drug body ) , pharmacodynamics ( effect investigate drug body ) , safety tolerability oral semaglutide healthy male Japanese Caucasian subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Assess Pharmacokinetics , Pharmacodynamics , Safety Tolerability Oral Semaglutide Healthy Male Japanese Caucasian Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male Japanese Caucasian subject Age 20 55 year ( inclusive ) time sign informed consent Body weight equal 54.0 kg Body mass index ( BMI ) 20.0 25.0 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) Glycosylated haemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) equal 6.0 % Presence history diabetes , cancer clinically significant cardiac , respiratory , metabolic , renal , hepatic , GI ( gastrointestinal ) , endocrine , dermatological , venereal , haematological , neurological , psychiatric disease disorder , judge investigator . Any disorder , opinion investigator , might jeopardise subject 's safety compliance protocol Personal family history medullary thyroid carcinoma ( MTC ) multiple endocrine neoplasia type 2 ( MEN2 ) History chronic pancreatitis idiopathic acute pancreatitis Smoking 5 cigarette ( include nicotine substitute product ) , equivalent , per day unwilling refrain smoke whenever require trial procedure Use prescription drug within 3 week 5 time halflife , whichever longer , prior Visit 2 ( Day 1 ) , nonprescription drug within 1 week prior Visit 2 ( Day 1 ) . The use vitamins mineral , occasional use paracetamol ( acetaminophen ) acetylsalicylic acid permit Any blood drawn excess 25 mL past month , donation blood plasma excess 400 mL within 3 month precede screen Previous GI surgery invasive corrective procedure involve oesophagus , stomach , duodenum , gallbladder ( e.g. , cholecystectomy ) , pancreas intestinal resection . Exempt subject underwent uncomplicated surgical diagnostic procedure appendectomy , hernia surgery , polypectomy , biopsy , well colonic gastric endoscopy
